“Hey! Ember!” Blaire yelled out, making Fontina jump slightly (and making her bountiful breasts bounce at the same time). “You in here?!”

“Yeppers Miss Blaire!” A cute, cherubic voice sounded out.

Fontina had to blink a few times when she saw Blaire’s assistant walk out from behind one of the taller counters, seeing a girl who was roughly her new roommate Ali’s height – She was even a fire type, a Vulpix Moemon actually, but unlike her short, petite Quilava roommate, this young girl was almost like a mini version of Blaire herself! The cute girl’s curly, crimson hair was held above her head with a hair net keeping the curly locks out of her bronze colored skin and cute cherubic face. Her body type was almost like Blaire’s save for the fact that she was about two feet shorter than her older, Flareon counterpart, so Ember’s figure was actually wider. She was wearing a black skirt (Fontina: ‘How much fabric is that!?’) that brush over her meaty thighs and large rump, with a large apron that barely covered her expansive gut and bulbous breasts (which, if Fontina had to ballpark, were actually larger than her own!).

“Ember,” Blaire started holding a chubby hand to the slightly puzzled Fontina. “This is my younger sister, Fontina.”

“Ooh! Nice to meet you!” Ember greeted with a slight curtsey. “Miss Blaire’s been telling me a lot about you!”

“Oh, that’s nice,” Fontina chuckled sheepishly as her face went a little red.

“Alright Ember, did you get what I asked for?” Blaire asked, garnering the attention back.

“Yep! Yep!” Ember nodded, making her whole body jiggle like jelly. “I got on the counter away from all the other food! But… Miss Ember?”

“Hmm?” Ember questioned with her head tilted. “Is something wrong dear?”

“Well, I can’t reach the juice in the fridge,” Ember answered with a large blush on her face.

Blaire chuckled to herself as she shook her head, “I’m sorry about that Ember, I forgot I left it on the top shelf in the fridge.”

That’s when the elder sister pointed towards the counter where Ember had come from, a smile on her face, “Fontina, I asked Ember to get some of the foods from Orre, so, you can help yourself while I help my mini me with the juice.”

“Alright,” Fontina replied as she watched the two fire-type Moemon waddle towards the line of fridges. As soon as they passed the counter, Fontina quickly made her way to the counter in question…

And Fontina had to clean her glasses at the food on the counter – The shear amount was amazing! Meats, cheeses, premade food, fruits and vegetables – all of them of greater sizes that what they normally were in other regions. ‘This is amazing! I didn’t know that peppers could grow that big!’

But there was something else that caught Fontina’s eye – There was a small wooden box that was opened up to reveal another weird fruit… It looked like an apple, but it was blue! A little curious, Fontina lifted the blue apple from its container and looked at it, ‘What kind of fruit is this supposed to be? Some sort of gag food or something?’

Fontina took a whiff of it. There didn’t seem to be any paint smell… And it was with the other food that her sister and Ember had laid out… It shouldn’t be bad, right?
1322.title: Sampling the Back

choices: A nice family meal ensues; Fontina can't shake the stange feeling of heaviness
Fontina soon learns just why Blaire is so big, this girl can EAT!
13221.content:
Fontina took another whiff; nope, definitely no spraypaint.

What she had detected was much more of an intoxicating aroma. Where the odor of apples was quite familiar to her as one of a relative smooth and fruity texture, the strange fruit in front of her had one that seemed to suffocate her nostrils. It was the same overall smell, just an overpowering dose of it mixed with something that reeked of onions. It wasn't a very compelling smell, Fontina would give it that. But somehow the harsh blend of perfumes that clung so desperately to only that bunch of blue fruits seemed to take her breath away. At once it sapped the energy from this excitable Vaporeon moemon, she almost felt the need to pull up a chair before she toppled over!

Warily, Fontina inched the odorous confection to her mouth, opening her lips and prepping her teeth for a big wide bite. Her pearly whites positioned themselves into a petite, ladylike bite around the cobalt surface of this mysterious berry before sinking them into its crunchy texture. All at once, an explosion of a sour bitterness was set off and carpet-bombed Fontina's unprepared taste buds. She liked it. Oddly enough, this foul mixture of sweet, fruity, sour, and gym socks seemed to work. If not just for her. She pulled the hand fruit away from her, checking it out for anything that might be wrong. On the inside, this fruit was more unappealing than its blue skin led it on to be. It looked more like apple sauce than the fruit it was actually supposed to resemble. Mushy and strange, this fruit's pungent aroma was definitely not the last of its worrying composition!

"Ew!" she heard from her right side, Blaire had apparently retrieved the much desired juice box for her adorable little assistant and worked her way back to Fontina's sight. "You actually like those things?" she asked teasingly, crinkling her nose a little as she wretched.

"I-I don't know..." Fontina said bashfully, "What is it?"

Blaire waddled up beside her little sister and started packing up ingredients for her breakfast sampler, since obviously her little sister had lost that sense of taste that Blaire had worked so hard to instill within her. "Its a fruit native to Orre, just like all this stuff." the stout Flareon moemon explained matter of factly as she gathered up seemingly random articles of food, "Its a traditional fruit though, only found in certain areas of that old ball of dirt and a few parts of Hoenn; we got it prepackaged and sent to us so that we wouldn't have to recreate the Wacan Berry sitting in Lax Incense for three weeks, but after we run out we'll have to start growing our own."

Fontina wretched slightly as she looked over the fruit in question, "Ew, like, incense?" she repeated, "Aren't you not supposed to eat that stuff?"

"Not unless you're a Snorlax moemon looking to make some chubby little babies." Blaire joked, "Its a real aphrodisiac to those guys, but it just slows a poor girl's metabolism down to near zilcho" she said in an exasperated tone, laying out some Orre-grown tortillas and sprinkling on some scrambled eggs, "Seriously, I ate like one bite and didn't feel like getting up for a whole week." The feeling really hit a home run for Fontina, she could really have gone for a place to sit down right about now. "But that's just nuts, everyone knows you're not supposed to eat incense!" the blue-haired belle said frantically. "Don't look at me, I'm only supposed to cook this stuff." Blaire grunted as she blanketed the eggs with bacon, "I said the exact same thing, but Mr. Sunny just won't listen."

Worriedly, Fontina looked down at her stomach; dreading the fabled horror stories of this fruit's mystical sway into the ways of the laze. She really couldn't afford any more unsightly pounds or inches to her already voluptuous frame! She was already down to her biggest bras, any more and she'd have to replace all of them! "Um, Blaire?" she asked nervously as her fingers slowly pulled the hairnet off of her head, "I-I think I'd better go, I shouldn't risk it. I mean, I ate a big bite of that fruit, and-

"Oh nonsense." Blaire said dismissively as she whipped out the sour cream, "I'm just teasing you, it's just like eating a cupcake or something- its not good for you, but its not gonna make you blow up like your big sister Blaire." she laughed, sending her entire body into a fuss as it jiggled wildly, "It didn't do a thing to Ember, she liked it too! Now go siddown, I'll make ya some breakfast."

"O-Okay..." Fontina was never really one for conflict, especially not with Blaire. Taking her sister's advice, Fontina decided to put the fruit completely out of sight and mind, disposing of the sapphire sphere in the garbage can as she stepped out from behind the counter. "Hey, not in there!" Blaire barked, reaching into the otherwise empty can and fishing out the berry, "I've still gotta adhere to a budget!" she blew on it and set it next to her, right where she could see it...

***


"And Breakfast is served!" Blaire cheered as she held a big platter of food in front of her, resting the silver tray in the crevice where her breasts met her spare tire, "There's enough for you and me here, we can catch up like good sisters do!" she said, happily plopping down next to Fontina on one of the cafeteria tables. She had gone all out with a myriad of options; a small stack of breakfast burritos, some oatmeal, bagels, a batch of muffins, where did she get the time to prepare all of this food?

No matter, Fontina had never been one to pass up a good old fashioned meal courtesy of her big sister Blaire. She smiled cheerfully and thanked her sister kindly before grabbing a bagel and the butter. Blaire took two burritos for herself along with a muffin and pulled out some strawberry jam. "So, Blaire, you're sure that fruit was okay for me to eat, right?" Fontina said warily.

"Seriously Fonty? You're still thinking about that?" Blaire rolled her eyes, "I told you its fine, and that you'll be fine. Seriously, when are you gonna grow up and learn to listen to your Big Sister Blaire. You know I've always been right about everything."
13221.title: Wacan Berry for Lightning Insulation?

choices: Fontina's Cell Phone Rings - Its from her friend Lynn!
Blaire: Wow Fonty! Nice job clearing most of the food!
132211.content:
“Come on Fonty,” Blaire pouted with her large eyes gleaming at her smaller sister as she munched on both of the breakfast burritos at the same time. “You’re a growing girl! Ya gotta have more than just a bagel!”

“Y-Yes,” Fontina sputtered as she pulled the half eaten bagel from her lips, which had curled into a slightly nervous smile on her face. “But, you k-know me, I’m always trying to watch my weight and…”

Before Fontina could continue, Blaire had placed her fingers onto Fontina’s lips, making the dark blue haired beauty from speaking. “Nonsense! Fontina, you don’t need to worry about such things! Heck, you’re one of the prettiest things on this campus, and you have been for the past few years! One big breakfast with your big sis isn’t going to ruin that figure of yours.”

Fontina pulled back slightly with her cheeks a little flushed from what her sister had told her, and began to speak. “But…”

“And if you mention that fruit again,” Blaire sighed loudly as she crossed her arms under her meaty bust. “Then I may just have to get Noir and Pamela in on this, and you know that you can never disagree with all three of us teaming up on you!”

Fontina sighed loudly, both out of exasperation and fear, she knew that her older siblings were like second parents to her and sometimes they acted as good advisors… And if all three of them were working together on something then they were practically unstoppable when it came to convincing people. “A-Alright… I guess a little more couldn’t…”

“Great to hear!” Blaire gleefully laughed before she ripped into the remains of her two breakfast burritos. After polishing off the breakfast foods, the large Flareon Moemon smiled brightly at Fontina. “And you need to relax Fontina, you’re like those people who get bent out of shape whenever there’s a new disease mentioned in the news, you think you’ve got all the symptoms and you think that you’ve got it – When in fact, your mind is tricking you into thinking that!”

As Fontina listened to Blaire’s explanation, she did have to admit that Blaire did have a point about that – Combined with all the stress of her final year at the academy and her ‘out growing’ of her unmentionables, Fontina’s mind could just be playing tricks on her. It was a reasonable explanation about Fontina’s earlier thought processes for sitting down, and it was just a berry soaked in incense – That can’t have any effect on her body, or at least not a drastic one.

So, with her mind cleared of that little misconception, Fontina gleefully finished off her bagel and was reaching for one of those breakfast burritos that Blaire had eaten earlier – They did smell pretty good. And the fresh cut fruit platter that Blaire brought out as well was so cute – The apple slices were cut to resemble little rabbits, and they were also coated in cinnamon as well!

‘No wonder Blaire didn’t come home much of the summer,’ Fontina thought as she plucked one of the cinnamon apple rabbits into her mouth, allowing the taste to set in her mouth – A sweet if not zesty taste melted into her tongue as she chewed. ‘She’s really gotten better!’

Before Fontina knew it, she had already eaten half of the fruit platter, a couple of muffins and about five of the remaining breakfast burritos, which was about three behind Blaire’s amount. The Vaporeon Moemon was practically lost amongst the bountiful tastes that were mixing in her mouth, she had almost forgotten about how good Blaire’s food was!

But looking at Blaire, it was apparent that she didn’t forget how good her cooking was, she was eating more of the food she had gotten out (which made Fontina rather thankful, most of the food was going into her bigger sister!). In fact, if Fontina didn’t know it, she could’ve sworn that Blaire might’ve put on quite a few other pounds over the summer break…

Fontina would’ve continued her train of thought but…
132211.title: That Heavy Feeling, Deep Down

choices: I need help cultivating these berries Mr. Sunny gave me, its a special project."
This new girl, Miyu, is no help at all. Can you help me move some stuff around?"
1322111.content:
...a distinctly familiar sense of vibration traveled up Fontina's leg just as she was about to choke down whatever scraps had been left over so Blaire wouldn't have anything to whine about. Under normal circumstances, a call during a strictly family occasion was forbidden. However since her poor stomach felt like it was about to explode, Fontina chalked it up to fate and whipped out her cell phone. "Ooh, now who could be calling my baby sister so early in the morning?" Blaire teased, leaning into the table and resting a cheek in her softly padded hand playfully, "Does little Fonty finally have a boyfriend to bug her?" her statement was dotted with cutesy kissy noises and short chuckles, much to the addressed girl's dismay. "N-No!" she retorted in a heaping hue of red, "I-I mean, I don't have a boyfriend..."

Actually, caller ID revealed the mystery dialer to be Lynndelle Laurel; a sweet moemon known throughout the academy for her good looks and enamoring personality. It seemed fitting that she and Fontina get along so well, all things considered. Fontina's thumb flipped the lid open and she pecked 'TALK' with her index finger. "Hello?" she answered cheerily, always the morning person. "Hi Fontina, its Lynn." the voice on the other end answered gracefully, "I, um, just wanted to see if we could hang out a little before classes start; I haven't seen you all Summer, and I wanted to catch up..."

"Oh, um..." Fontina turned to face Blaire's cherubic countenance, who simply smiled in the way that fully-grown sisters do when they realize that their younger siblings have been offered a chance to hang out with friends in lieu of spending time with them. "Blaire, I um, really don't mean to be rude... you're my big sister and all, but..." the hefty Flareon woman simply waved dismissively at the worrysome sister in front of her. "Go on, its cool, I'm not going anywhere." she said laxly, "Tell you what; we'll meet up at lunchtime." Fontina's eyebrows flexed upwards frettingly, "Oh... but, you cooked so much." However she was defeated by a hearty laugh from her older sister, "Go on, get outta here. I'll just split what's left over with my Mini-me."

Fontina smiled widely as she turned her attention back to the phone. "Yes, I'm still here." she said gently into the speaker, "Gardening Club? I can be there in like, five minutes... alright, see you then. Bye!" she clicked the phone shut and slowly rose to her feet with some labored difficulty. Her stomach, taut and stuffed, was just barely noticeable from underneath her top, and while it was all but inconspicuous, it seemed to pain Fontina greatly. She brushed it gently with the back of her hand and nearly wretched at the slight pressure. "Oh..." she said quietly to herself. "Hm?" Blaire asked, still in her playfully flirtatious position, "What was that?" Fontina snapped back to reality, "Um, just that... I'm sorry, I've got to go meet Lynn at her Gardening Club." she said quietly, "I mean, I know I haven't seen either of you all Summer, but..."

"Stop worrying, my feelings ain't hurt!" Blaire said sternly, "Now go on, I'll catch up with you at lunch."

"Thanks Blaire." Fontina half-apologized-half-thanked her bigger sister as she started towards the cafeteria's exit. "Hey, hold up a sec!" Blaire called after her, struggling to heft her heavy body from her seat...

"You're not leaving your poor sister all alone without even a hug, are you?"
***

And what a hug it was. But that's almost completely trivial. Currently occurring, Fontina was making a long venture down a previously unvisited hallway that she wasn't even aware existed. She was fluent in all areas of the school, having been a vital part to the student body through her sophomore and junior years, and knew just about where everything was. The busty Vaporeon girl could have sworn that she had been down every hallway at least once in this expansive school- and that in itself was an accomplishment. Maybe they did some remodeling during the summer? She couldn't imagine why, the school was already big enough...

But no matter. Room 563 was upon her; within sight and smell, Fontina could tell that the Gardening Club was close by. The overpowering aroma of dirt and a myriad of flora wafted up and about Fontina's delicate nose, irritating her sensitive capillaries. It was a hot, thick scent that filled the hallway. It was an absolutely intoxicating smell that unfortunately had proved strong enough to leak through the sealed doors of Lynn's Gardening Club. The ghastly aroma was so powerful, in fact, that it belabored Fontina's breathing. It left her panting, struggling for air. Her forehead grew heavy with sweat, and her glasses fogged. Yet, it seemed so familiar...

"Fontina!" a familiar voice rang throughout the hallway, seeming to come from the very source of the smell. "Hey, Fontina, over here!"

Fontina was relieved to see that Lynn had found her, rather than the opposite. It would have taken her forever to lug herself over to the Gardening Club at this rate. It honestly felt like her feet had been encased in concrete; she was so slow! "Oh, hey..." Fontina said meekly, letting out a big yawn as she plodded over to her friend, "...hey Lynn." The younger girl quirked her head, "Are you alright?" the Bayleef moemon asked, concernedly placing a hand on Fontina's forehead. "You don't have a fever, have you been getting enough sleep?"

And, in the spirit of the currently absent Quilava moemon Ali, Fontina couldn't help but notice Lynn's surprisingly enhanced gazongas. "Holy crap!" Fontina shouted, temporarily awake due to shock. "What? What's wrong?!" Lynn asked, whipping her hand back. "Y-Your breasts!" Fontina mumbled, "I mean, I knew they were always pretty, um, just... wow!" she seemed even too bothered to dip into her expansive vocabulary. What was wrong with her? More importantly though, how did Lynn sprout such gigantic boobies?!

"Oh... these?" Lynn asked in a flighty voice as she looked down at her endowment, "I guess they sort of popped up over Summer break." she said in an embarrassed tone of voice, "They're really not so great... I don't see how you do it, Fontina."

At that, Fontina's already red face turned even darker. "Oh, wow, that's... well, I guess you get why I'm always complaining about them, huh?" she giggled. Lynn seemed unaffected by the strange odor in the hallway. Perhaps it was just Fontina? "Anyway, I kind've have an ulterior motive for inviting you down here... I mean, I really want to hang out, but there's something I need help with...
1322111.title: Odorous Hallways...

choices: The three get it done quick (while Miyu and Lynn help themselves to the berries)
Fontina stumbles, sending a box of berries splattering over all of the girls!
13221112.content:
“… There’s this new girl who signed up during the summer,” Lynn explained with an embarrassed look on her face. “At first, I was really glad to have someone around here to help with all the plants, but ever since she got here a few days ago, all she’s done is laze about and even ate some of the weird fruits that were planted here over the summer.”

Hearing that, Fontina subconsciously placed a hand on her slightly taught stomach, just remembering that berry that she took a bite out of… Her mind was slowly returning to Blaire’s words about that Wacan Berry… That same smell seemed to loft about the gardening club’s green house.

“Fontina? You okay?”

The busty Vaporeon shook her head slightly when she realized that Lynn was speaking to her, making Fontina’s face turn a bit more red – Even more so than when she was gazing at the Bayleaf’s surprising increased chest size. “S-Sorry, I’ve been zoning in and out all morning…”

“… Hmm, lemme guess,” Lynn snickered with a warm smile on her face as she stood alongside Fontina, gently placing her hands on the Vaporeon’s shoulders. “Pirate Captain Raymundo?”

Fontina’s face was so red that steam was flying off of her face and steamed up her glasses… Or maybe that was the muggy atmosphere of the green house? Either way, Fontina was embarrassed, was she as easily readable just like the books she loved so much?

Not like she could take it back. “S-So… Who’s this n-new member?”

“Um, some Leafeon girl,” Lynn stated as she began to gently push her friend through the greenhouse. “At first I thought she’d be a real great help, but like I said, ever since she’s gotten here, all she does is laze about and munches on some of the berries that Mr. Sunny gave us to cultivate. And I’ve gotten so much stuff to move around that I won’t be able to finish it all before class starts… At least, not on my own. So, what do you say Fontina, can you please help out a good ole friend?”

“Oh Lynn, you don’t need to worry,” Fontina replied as the two rounded a table that was filled to the brim with various plants. “I would be more than happy to help out a friend, I wouldn’t be much of a friend if didn’t help right?”

‘Besides, if this Leafeon girl is who I think it is… Ugh…’

As soon as the two reached the other end of the table, which was effectively at the other end of the room, there was a large pile of boxes with Unova’s marking on the sides of them. The sun was gleaming over them and onto the floor in between them… as well as the pair of hams stuffed into a pair of khaki shorts that almost looked painted on. Fontina’s eyes went a little dull when she saw that, it wasn’t the first time she saw those thunderous thighs… At least they had pants on during school hours, thank goodness.

“Pst!” Lynn whispered to Fontina. “That’s her, that’s… Uh, w-what was her name again?”

“Miyu,” Fontina sighed loudly.

“Yeah! That’s it!” Lynn cheered slightly as she pointed towards the large hams stuffed in the khaki shorts. “Wait… How’d you know that?”

“Miyu, get up,” Fontina sighed again as she tapped her foot against the khaki clad bum. “Stop lazing about!”

A loud groan echoed through the greenhouse, making the legs and buns push themselves onto their feet, and slowly the body that was connected to those chunky thighs and bum stood up straight and turned around. “Fonty? Is that *yawn* you?”

The girl in front of both Lynn and Fontina was indeed a Leafeon Moemon, with long cascading forest green hair that looked to be leafy with quite a few strands popping atop of her hair. She was dressed in a black belly shirt that was a little short around her bulging belly and as mentioned, she was wearing a pair of khaki cargo pants, which, now that she was standing up, showed that they weren’t painted on, but were still tight enough to show her chunky rear and thunderous thighs. In all honesty from her cute face, chest, and arms – she looked like a slim girl, but as you traveled downward, her body began to widen out, giving her a pear like shape.

Miyu yawned loudly, as she revealed a small blue stain around her mouth that she quickly wiped away with her arm. “What are *yawn* you doing here?”

“You two know each other?” Lynn questioned blinking a few times.

“Yeah, she’s my sister,” Fontina explained with a smile, albeit there was a little bit of embarrassment as evidenced by the blush on her face. “Miyu, you never said that you joined the gardening club.”

“I didn’t?” Miyu questioned with her head tilted slightly. “Oh yeah, I joined the gardening club.”

Fontina slapped her head as Lynn walked past her and examined one of the boxes that was on the ground, “Miyu… Did you open another box of these things?”

“You’re gonna have to be a bit more specific,” Miyu yawned again as she turned towards Lynn.

“The Wacan Berries,” Lynn sighed loudly as she turned the box upside down, showing that there wasn’t any more berries inside the box. “You can’t keep eating them, we’re supposed to grow them for Mr. Sunny, otherwise we’ll never get the extra funds that we need for our club!”

‘Mr. Sunny’s growing plants here?’ Fontina thought to herself, blinking a few times behind her glasses. With a shake of her head, Fontina turned her attention back to Miyu. “Anyway, Miyu, you joined the club, so you gotta help out…”

“… Whatever,” Miyu yawned loudly. “Fine, what do you need me to do?”

“All we gotta do is move the boxes to the other side of the room,” Lynn explained, motioning to the large amount of boxes that were around her. “If all three of us work together and get this done, then we can get it done quickly and maybe just hang out before classes begin…”

“Sounds good to me,” Fontina stated.

“Sure…” Miyu yawned.
13221112.title: The Lazy New Help

choices: So the incense burns out really late, its lunchtime! OH CRAP!!
Fontina comes to her senses and leaves her two buddies in lieu of second period
132211121.content:
"Uuuuuugh!" Miyu's groans of protest were an absolute constant during this stressing ordeal; made even moreso by said complaints, "This is so haaaaaard!"

If one were to simply overhear her complaining, you'd think that the lazy leafy lass had done the work of ten strapping young men; one obviously being misled. She had actually barely touched any of the Unovian crates aside from the flapping tops, while the set of busty upperclassmen did their best and toiled their way into a slow, steady succession of moved boxes (revealing that amongst them all were once desks, lost to the Summer's sudden acquirement of berries and incense) onto the other side of the room. All the while, Miyu had touched maybe three or four of the twenty-five or so crates once the job was said and done. Leaving ten for Lynn to haul and Fontina with eleven. Of course, while the laziest girl in the room was the most vocal in her displeasures, Lynn and Fontina weren't exactly having the times of their lives either.

The boxes were heavy and cumbersome, loaded to the brim with berries upon berries that while small were certainly a very heavy classification all their own; a two-foot cube of them must have weighed about thirty or so pounds. That alone was nothing, but the awkwardly robust carrier crates were the real problem- being a challenge to load and unload- combined with the twin set of aching backs that belonged to the more well-endowed ladies in the classroom. After all was said and done, things had gotten finished. After school, Lynn would surely lead her gardening club out into their designated pastures and start planting these babies; earning that extra funding through hard work as it should be. Oh how Lynn adored the toil of the commonwealth, something so foreign to her own sheltered childhood. It made her feel warm inside knowing that she was helping Mother Earth in the natural cycle of plant-replant-plant. Plus, the extra funding would certainly help her all-but-dud of a club...

There was a loud plopping sound in the corner of the room. Miyu, who had been tasked with delivering the last of the crates over to the cubic mountain in the corner, had finally allowed her pathetic muscles to give out. She doubled over herself, tired and far beyond winded. The bottom-heavy moemon's package fell to the floor and her bum soon atop that, her apple bottom forcing the box's sides to flare out very much like her own hips. "Ahh..." she blissfully sighed, leaning back until her neck touched the uneven exposure of the front of a desk, "I'm beat." Fontina and Lynn, just as tired from about triple the work, could only shake their heads in shame; but feel a certain sense of comradeship with the lazy Leafeon girl. They too, would kill for a place to sit down right now. Fortunately, since St. Gijinka's was such a generous institution these days, there were plenty of comfortable chairs to rest one's bum in; including a very nice loveseat in the back covered in anti-soil fabric.

It should go without saying that Lynn and Fontina decided to rest their pert rumps in said loveseat while Miyu sat on a nearby armchair- dragging the box full of berries over near her for a footrest. "Well, that went by a lot faster than expected." Fontina said cheerfully as she took somewhat labored breaths, "Great job girls." Lynn smiled warmly while Miyu gave a thumbs-up, "No problem Fonty." Both sets of eyes turned to face the current bane of activity and shot her a somewhat upsetting look. "You touched, like four boxes!" Fontina admonished, "You whined almost as hard as we worked!"

Seeing that the situation was turning ugly, ever-peacekeeping Lynn decided to play mediator with everyone's favorite subject; "Who wants something to eat?" she asked in a flighty voice, "We all worked up such an appetite that I'm sure we've earned a little dip into the supplies here!" she said nervously, gingerly rising to a leaning position and plucking the footrest from underneath Miyu's feet. "Hey!" she whined, "That was my box!"
***
Now a little explanation is due to completely understand the meaning behind the mysterious Lax-Wacan delicacy. Supposedly, somewhere in the desert continent of Orre, the Wacan berries grew just as heartily as they did in Hoenn. They were harvested by local farmers and sold on the market for kabillions. This, aside from being generally rare to begin with, made them exceedingly popular. Eventually, don't ask how it happened, a single berry fell into an open thurible of Lax Incense and went unnoticed save for the gradually-changing odor. It stayed for almost a month before it was discovered to be still edible and, while oily, quite deliciously revolting. Seriously, most people hate to love this dish. As the mixture took the best of both components; amplifying the natural insulation powers against electricity and slowing the heartrate of any moemon who eats it, it was originally going to be sold to the Marines (lol, type joke XD) of Orre for faking one of their agents death during capture or times of high crisis. However, as it soon became apparent that this specific berry amplified the mellow conditioning to anyone who inhaled it, the idea was dropped immediately in favor of watching paint dry and pots boil. To this day, this section of Orre is recognized as the largest belt of nonproductivity in the known world.

So, basically, this special mixture was intoxicating.

And now it was in the hands of three inexperienced students.

Miyu was the one who insisted on lighting the incense, and Lynn was the one who got the censer. Fontina was initially against it, but found that for some reason she was just too tired to stand straight. Her back ached from a combination of lifting all those heavy boxes and having such thick curves. Maybe a little relaxation wouldn't kill her, she thought at least she deserved a break. And so as Lynn sat back down, the both of them sank into the deep loveseat like rocks. The verdant girl in the skirt had a heavenly smile on her face, perfectly sculpted facial features beaming elegantly as she and her blue-haired buddy lost themselves to the ocean of relaxation that slowly permeaded them with their Lax waves. Again, it was Miyu who first brought out a handful of berries and began popping them into her mouth like bonbons. Hazy-minded, Lynn and Fontina decided to follow suit. Their natural inhibitions thrown aside by the temptations of tastiness and amusement. They dimwittedly chuckled at everything, sometimes for no reason at all! They just sat there, the Lax incense doing its magic on yet another non-Snorlax victim...

Because of course, as we all know, it made those guys hornier than a Nidoking on Viagra :D
132211121.title: Three Pronged Circle

choices: Miyu and Lynn (lazily) drag Fontina to the cafeteria for lunch
Mr. Sunny appears! Instead of being mad though, he invites them to lunch.
1322111211.content:
Everything was rather relaxing, the sounds of the school and students echoing through the background were drowned out by the effects of the incense – creating an aura of total relaxation around the three girls. Fontina’s earlier troubles were almost melted away as she breathed in more and more of the incense filled air and as for the two grass types… Well, Lynn was simply giddy as she popped another berry into her mouth and Miyu was already opening up a second box (within the first few minutes they seemed to have been able to clear out a box that was filled with a dozen of the berries).

And although her troubles were melting away, Fontina’s dulled logic knew that they were still there in the back of her head. Subconsciously, the Vaporeon girl rubbed her slightly softened stomach – Not noticing that the big breakfast that she had with Blaire had already digested itself through her stomach – and moaned slightly. “Miyu… Y-You should eat t-those…”

“Fontina’s right, Miyu,” Lynn yawned loudly as she leaned over in her seat and pulled the box of berries from the lazy Leafeon, however, the grassy girl had already plucked a few berries from the box and was already munching on them. “You can’t eat those…”

“Yeah, Blaire told me that… That they…” Fontina muttered loudly, placing her other hand on her chin, trying to gather all of her thoughts. Although, with the incense seeping deeper and deeper into her system, the Voluptuous Vaporeon’s thoughts were getting lazier and cloudier. “What did she s-s-say again?”

“I dunno Fonty,” Miyu replied as she tossed the last of berries she grabbed into her gapping maw. “I wasn’t with you when you Blaire said that. All I know is that they’re tasty…”

“The smell’s off putting,” Lynn admitted as she lifted up one of the berries and squeezed it in between her fingers, not realizing that as she squeezed it, a good portion of the juice inside the berry dripped from it and splashed right in between the valley that was her cleavage – The only instance was that she shivered slightly at the surprisingly cold berry juice contacted with her skin. “But, after lifting all of those boxes, I’m so tired and hungry…”

Lynn gingerly placed the berry into mouth, and slowly chewed it between her teeth a few times before she swallowed it. “And for some reason, I can’t get enough of these… I’m sure two boxes of these little guys won’t change the request that Mr. Sunny asked for. But no more after this one.”

That’s when Lynn held the box up to Fontina, making the Vaporeon girl grimace slightly at the sight of the berries. In addition to the one bite that she had from before Blaire had given her breakfast, Fontina had accidentally downed two of the previous berries from the last box, Miyu had eaten a majority of those berries (it was the same box that she had opened before they had moved boxes) while Lynn had eaten more than what the Vaporeon girl had sunk her teeth into.

And the other two were eating more of them! Fontina didn’t know if the effects of those berries were real or not, but she had been feeling more sluggish from when she took a simple bite from one of them… But even then, she had already eaten two more! If what Blaire said was true, then Fontina would become a blimp by the end of the…

“URK!” Fontina yelped when another berry was pushed into her mouth, almost making her gag as she quickly chewed the berry to make sure that she wouldn’t gag on it. When she looked down, she saw that Miyu’s hand was pulling back, some of the berry juice smeared over her fingers. With a loud audible gulp, Fontina took a few deep breaths before she pushed up her glasses and leered at her younger sister. “M-Miyu!?! W-What in the world are y-y-you doing?!”

“You need to relax Fonty,” Miyu snickered with a large grin on her face. “Indulging once in a while isn’t going to thicken the thighs or blow up your boobs… Not that they don’t need any more padding.”

Fontina’s face went completely red when she heard her sister say those things, normally Miyu was lazy and not this forward with her opinions. She preferred to just enjoy lazing about and munch on whatever Blaire would serve. Maybe this Lax Incense was having a different effect on the usually lazy Moemon…

“So just relax,” Miyu yawned loudly as she sat back, allowing her cushy behind to seep into the cushioned seat. “And take a load off…”

TTTTTTT

~Hours later…~


“So… What if they made a car that runs on water?”

“Isn’t that a boat?”

“It is?”

“I dunno…”

The room was practically seeping with lax incense, making the three girls almost slipping from their seats, quite a few emptied boxes of wacan berries scattered amongst the floor – And yet, there were almost another countless number of the boxes back where the girls had packed them.

As for the girls themselves, it was a miracle that they were even awake at this point in time – Miyu was giddy and snickering to herself as she rubbed her softened stomach. Lynn was trying to clean up the mess with her feet, kicking the boxes with her feet, knocking them to the side.

And Fontina…

Well…

Fontina slowly lifted up her cell phone, grimacing at the time that was displayed on the phone…

11:59 a.m.

She had skipped the two first classes of the semester! And inside, she was feeling horrible about that but there was also that feeling of eating quite a few of those berries that she had hoped to avoid the rest of her life…

And to make things worse… Fontina was actually hungry now!

*GURRRGGLLE!*

*GRROWL!*

And by the sounds of it, she wasn’t the only one hungry in the room…
1322111211.title: Everyone use Rest! (and Leftovers!)

choices: Om Nom Nom! Its time for Blaire's cooking! And she doesn't let anyone go hungry!
Oh hey, its Ali with some friends eating with Blaire! Super Kewl!
13221112111.content:
"Guys?"

At this point, Fontina was very much aware at how seriously behind schedule she had allowed herself to fall. Or did she allow herself? Was it at all possible to blame these berries? Or maybe it was Miyu's fault; when they were kids she was always getting the whole family behind in their plans due to her strong habit of getting a 12 hour sleep every night. She had missed more school buses that way. Anyway, who ever's fault it was or not, Fontina had seriously failed to keep track of the time and had somehow lost it for almost four hours. And again, somehow, in those four hours she and her two cohorts had gone through an entire box of those Wacan berries- ie the ones that were meant to be planted, harvested and plopped into Lax Incense so that the whole school could eat them! Oh no!

However, the effects of both components had not left her busty body all too willing to comply with any foolish ideas of "moving" (ha, moving. who does that anymore?) As she squeaked out the single word her voice was found to be soft and unassuming- curt and a little raspy. Fontina's throat felt full of sandpaper, a probable side effect of so much grainy-soggy-squishy indulgence combined with the suffocating aroma that filled the room. Her head was swimming, her thoughts fluid and mentally intangible. All at once everything seemed like a brilliant idea even (and especially) forgetting class and simply enjoying more time on the couch with her friend and sister. No doubt they were experiencing the same sapping of motivation and will; but who really gave two flying Squirtles about motivation and will? It seemed to be a general consensus that everyone should just lay around and be lazy. They could totally live off of those Wacan berries, and these chairs were sooooo comfortable... could they drink Lax Incense? And where would they make? The corner? No, that required standing. Some sort of bedpan device-

"Oh no!"

Lynn's voice, despite the despair that was intended so as to instill shock and a little bit of sensibility into her gorgemates, came out whimsical and only slightly disappointed in an extremely adorable fashion. "Miyuuu!" she said lazily, "Fontiiiinaaaa!" she yawned again, "I can't believe you ate twoooo whooooole boxessssss... Mister Sunny's gonna... yawn... be, like, really upset with me." Again, despite the severity of the situation, her usually pristine posture befitting a girl bred into the upper class was uncharacteristically lacking. She had literally sunk into the loveseat with Fontina, finding a nice spot between the cushion, armrest, and padded back to nestle herself into. She didn't even get up as she cried out in lackluster despair, "Oh nooooo... now Mister Sunny's gonna cut our funding... this is terrrrrrrible..."

Miyu snorted from the other side of the relaxation center. "You ate some too, Melon Boobs!" she said with a remarkable amount of energy in her voice, "In fact, I think you ate the most!" All throughout the experience, the Leafeon girl had shown remarkably different symptoms than her two cohorts in overindulgence. For starters, while their general attitudes consisted of a lack of tenacity, Miyu's was given a long-needed recharging; filling her with a slight vigor in her actions. She laughed differently, and more often. From her lazily dimwitted chuckle, a fully blossomed giggle emerged as successor. She laughed so much that her cheeks had creased with her smile. She was apparently, what one would call, a Happy High. Just as Fontina was a Lazy High, and Lynn a Flighty one. However, while these new attitudes seemed to be just as different from eachother as their non-incense goaded counterparts, they all seemed to share something in common with one another:

These berries.

Unstewed, of course. It took approximately twenty five days for Wacan berries absorb enough juices to gather the full effect of the Orrenian delicacy. However, like all berries, most moemon could eat these raw without hesitation. Water and Flying moemon especially preferred them- as it introduced a natural insulation good enough for one sharp jolt of electricity- an unintended side-effect of the mixture. So naturally, members of either class (should they not mind the taste) would find these very beneficial. The Lax Incense, which smelled a bit like a burger joint, was what made them so dangerous. As we all know, incense is not to go into your mouth, but waft gently into your nostrils. When you mix these particular orifices up regarding Lax Incense, its quite possible that you could die. Which is why the mixture doesn't sit for too long. Home-grown Wacan berries are thick as rocks, and it takes a long time for the juices to penetrate the crunchy exterior without rupturing the glands inside. So, again, it won't kill you. It just alters the taste of the berry... and smell, while we're on that subject.

So, in short, the fruit gets you a little buzzed thanks to the foreign element introduced to the berry. Its not quite addictive, at least not physically, due to the horrible taste and putrid smell. However it does introduce what might as well be Concentrated Slothlyhood into your system. And the effects, while not permanent, certainly make the next hour or so after consumption a major trip. Suddenly everything's profound; the breeze in the air is just for you, the loud noises of your surroundings become a beautiful orchestra, and every food is delicious... namely those berries in the box- as our three couch-bound heroines have no-doubt learned by now.

"Hey you, like, watch yer mouff Missypants." loopy Lynn said with wavering influx, "I could, like, kick yer butt and take your wallet."

"Did you just say 'Mouff', Lynn?"

"Oh no, did I?" her dainty face grew red as a tomato as she burst into wild laughter, "Ohohoho, silly me!"

Yep. They're totally out of it. Y'see, on top of being extremely expensive and hard to come by, the remarkable thing about Lax Incense is that it only takes so much of it to fill a room. Discovered in Ancient Sinnoh already in thuribles, the archeologists in charge (after a long session in a hole that mainly pertained to contemplating String Theory) set to work on recreating these containers so as to keep authenticity. Aware of the many effects that different incenses might have on people, they saw to it that this one be as extremely limited as possible in its dosage. So, to relate to our setting at hand, these girls' three-hour long pigout on berries was only a 1/10th fraction of what an open container could do. This basically meant that anyone in the garden club, Lynn Miyu and whatnot, were going to be surrounded by at least ten of them going at one time as they stewed the Wacan berries for the cafeteria. Do the math.

"G-Guys, we should really get going..." Fontina said weakly as she pointed to her watch, "Its lunchtime and-

"Oh, right, Lunch!" Miyu said, eyes glinting greedily as she pat her already full belly, "I promised Blaire I'd meet her in the cafeteria. I better skeedaddle."

"B-But wait, I said that I'd-

"Oh that sounds FUN!!" Lynn squealed, "Let me come too, Miyu?!"

"But I was already going to-"

The newly energized Leafeon girl contemplated for a second, "Well, alright!" she said merrily, much to the delight of the ecstatic Bayleef girl

"Miyu, I-

"Fonty, you should totally come too!" Miyu said, shimmying up to a standing position and grabbing both girls by the hand, "I know Blaire'd love to see you again!"

Rather than fight, and insist that she was planning on having lunch with her older sister anyway, Fontina decided to give in and let her littler (however only in name if that butt got any bigger) sister have this one as she struggled to pull them both up with her atrophied muscles...
13221112111.title: Happy Herbs

choices: All girls, Blaire included, get stuffed silly!
Halfway through the meal, "Hey! Its Ember, Ali and... Who's the Arcanine guy?"
132211121111.content:
To say that Fontina was being dragged through the halls of the academy wasn’t just a figure of speech, both Miyu and Lynn had one of their arms looped through the arms of the dazed Fontina – That combination of lax incense and Wacan berries was really having an effect on the poor curvy Vaporeon girl, up to the point that she could barely form a coherent sentence – Not that she really would have a chance to get a word in edgewise.

“So, your sister… Blaize was it?”

“Naw Lynn, it’s Blaire,” Miyu giggled senselessly.

“Right! Right!” Lynn nervously chuckled with a large blush on her face. “I dunno where my mind is today!”

Originally when the three were beginning their trek through the hallways, it was Fontina who was helping her busty friend and bootylicious sister through the hallways by allowing them to lean on her shoulders – Despite the fact that her body was questioning why she was even bothering to help the two with their own walking – Not to mention why she was walking.

It was by that logic that Fontina’s body followed suite, and almost sent all three of the girls to the ground – Forutnately, all that happened was that the three girls stumbled into two other Moemon girls (one seemed to be a stuck up Snivy girl and a Frosslass that was dressed up as a Maid?) and both Miyu and Lynn took that chance to drag Fontina away.

Which brings us to this moment…

“So yeah, your sister’s here,” Lynn continued talking with some of her original personality starting to peak out from the effects of the Lax/Wacan combination. “I mean, you two are siblings, and you’ve got another one here?”

“Actually,” Fontina mumbled loudly, the fresh air (well, the clear air) in the halls starting to reach her and clear her mind, although her body was still yawning about how it didn’t want to move – still the stomach was the one in complete charge at the moment. “Blaire works here, as do two of our other siblings… And I think Jin and Kay are here too.”

“Meh,” Miyu yawned with a shrug of her shoulders. “I dunno.”

And it looked like Miyu’s lazy nature was starting to reappear as well.

TTTTTTT


“MIMI! FONTY!”

Lynn was genuinely surprised when the three got to the kitchen, and there were several reasons why she felt that surprise – One, the mix of wondrous aromas was enough to instantly make anyone’s mouth water within a few seconds. There was a mixture of seafood, sweet fruits and grilled meats that wandered through the air.

That first reason was enough to dilute Lynn’s senses to almost make her miss the other reasons for her surprise – The second was the large Flareon Moemon that was manning most of the stations in the kitchen (of course there was other help), and how fast she had spotted and walked (waddled) towards the other two Eevee evolution Moemon girls. It was almost hypnotic to see Blaire’s massive body jiggle with each step, her breasts barely confined in that small black top.

The third reason was that said Flareon girl immediately wrapped her meaty arms around both Fontina and Miyu in a large hug that mashed the two smaller girls into the expansive cleavage and billowing belly of the tanned fire-type girl. Even more surprising was that despite how out of shape Blaire looked, she was clearly able to lift both of the slightly smaller girls (and it wasn’t like they were as light as a feather).

“I’m SOOOOOOOOO glad that you both came!” Blaire squealed with delight with a large smile appearing on her chubby face. “I was beginning to think that you wouldn’t show up!”

“B-Blaire, we…” Fontina sputtered, starting to get crushed from her sister’s larger breasts getting smooshed up against her own smaller (but still quite healthy) bust. “We w-w-wouldn’t b-break a promise to… To you…”

“Yeah, w-what she said,” Miyu added.

“Aw, you two,” Blaire sighed with joy as she released her siblings from her death hug. It was then that Blaire noticed Lynn, which made Lynn slightly nervous. “And I see you brought a friend too!”

“I hope I’m not intruding,” Lynn stated with a slight bow.

“Don’t worry about it,” Blaire replied with a wide smile. “Good food tastes great with more company! Now, come on you three! You got here just before the lunch rush, we can enjoy a good meal together before I have to get out there and serve the students.”

A few moments later, the group of curvy girls were seated at a table inside the cafeteria, which had a few other students in it at the moment, but for the most part, it was mostly them. And at the table they were seated at were several dishes of food that came from Italian backgrounds – With pasta, pizza, salads, breadsticks and other kinds of foods that created a small cloud of steam that floated over the table.

“Well, dig in!” Blaire announced with her plate lifted up.

Miyu and Lynn were more than willing to obliged and began to reach for the foods with the silverware that was in them. However, Fontina was a bit more concerned about this, and while it wasn’t for the fact that there was a large amount of fatty food in front of her… Well, in a sense it was, but it wasn’t the calories she was concerned about, “Uh, Blaire?” Fontina questioned, realizing that both Lynn and Miyu were already digging into some of the pasta. “Don’t you have to pay for this? I mean, I don’t…”

Fontina didn’t get a chance to finish, Blaire had taken one of the breadsticks and popped it into Fontina’s mouth. “Don’t you worry about that, Fonty, since I work here, I get a real good discount on my meals, it’s a bit of a bonus… Besides, even if that weren’t the case, you’re family, and money shouldn’t come between family!

“Now, hurry up and eat! We shouldn’t let this stuff get cold!”

Fontina bit down on the breadstick she was eating and realized that there was gooey mozzarella cheese stuffed inside of it, and it was pretty tasty. But still, there was that gnawing thought in the back of her head – Mostly with the Wacan Berries she had eaten nary even an hour ago, what Blaire had said (even if it was a joke, it still worried the Vaporeon girl), and all this food that was dripping with calories…

… She didn’t want to outgrow her clothes again, and she couldn’t help but feel as though her already tight bra was beginning to feel a bit tighter than it did earlier this morning…

But it was Blaire, her older sister! She didn’t want to hurt her bigger (both in the familial and literal sense) sister’s feelings, and to be honest, the food was smelling quite delicious…

With a sigh, Fontina began to reach for the salad, at least that was the healthiest of the foods there – Even though it was dripping in ranch dressing…
132211121111.title: A Stuffed Family Meal… Plus One Bayleaf

choices: Fontina breaks free and decides to go to class.
Fontina lazes around the house and skips classes.
1322112.content:
"Wow Fonty!" Blaire exclaimed, surprise evident in her tone, "I know I have a pretty big appetite, but I didn't think you of all moemon would match me for a meal!"

Fontina's jaw, which had been in the process of munching on what had to be her tenth muffin at this point, froze as the magical food journey she'd been on suddenly came to a screeching halt after opening her eyes and surveying just how much she'd eaten. She blushed profusely and almost ended choking on the baked good in her mouth as she saw that she had consumed a plethora of pastries, a bunch of burritos, and more than enough fruit to feed about two or three other moemon. In short, she was speechless.

B-but I don't even feel full... she thought, furrowing a brow in concern while pressing a hand to her stomach, which was now a bit bloated due to the meal she'd just finished. Could this have been due to that berry I ate before?

“M-maybe I overdid it a litte…” Fontina squeaked, her face a tomato red as she surveyed all that she’d consumed. Blaire however, simply let out a good natured chuckle and shook her head.

“Oh Fonty lighten up! Indulging once in a while isn’t going to kill you!” Her portly sibling said while patting her on the back.

“I guess…” Fontina muttered begrudgingly.

“Fonty-yyyyy,” Blaire chided with a mock glare, “remember what we just talked about?”

“I know…” Fontina couldn’t help the small smile that found its way onto her face from her sister’s words. Her siblings always did know how to ease her concerns about things like this.

“Good!” Blaire chirped, handing Fontina a sack, “now I packed a lunch for you since you’re a little short on time! All sorts of good stuff in there!” the rotund Flareon turned and began to walk away, “anyways, I better go find my little double of a vulpix, so I’ll catch you later Fonty!”

“A-alright see you later!” Fontina waved as her sister left. Now the lovely vaporeon knew there was only one hassle left, getting to class on time. Normally this wouldn’t be an issue, as Fontina prided herself on being punctual and early to classes, but this time around she found that due to the way she stuffed herself she was feeling quite lethargic, and couldn’t seem to find the will or the motivation to even get up from her chair.

Come on… she groaned to herself, letting out a belch due to the digesting food packed into her gullet, I can’t be late to class on the first day! That’s just lazy! Fontina knew something was up, she was never not motivated to going to class, however, she couldn’t help the fact that her body was just not feeling the action of going to class.

Little did she know that this was due to the work of the Wacan berry, already doing its duty of sapping both her metabolism and her will to even perform the smallest of actions.

However, Fontina was never one to make a bad habit if she could help it, and so her fortitude was being tested against the whispers of the wacan berry’s lax properties. On one side, her mind told her that she should really get to class, on the other hand, another part of her was saying that she could afford to miss the first couple days of class since they were really just the introductory period to the subjects.

Finally…
1322112.title: Blaire: Wow Fonty! Nice job clearing most of th...

choices: The next day, a little bit of the weight gain already shows...
Later that evening, Blaire comes back to find the aftermath of the chaos...
13221122.content:
Well...it's not like anything important goes on during the first couples days in classes anyways... Fontina reasoned, her mind already persuaded by the Wacan berry's influence towards a more unproductive path. Besides, she reassured herself, I'll just go after the first week once all the precursory things are out of the way! She nodded to herself in affirmation, believing that she'd come up with the best plan of action, though it was actually the opposite of what she'd usually do.

"Now what to do..." She muttered to herself as she looked around the house for something to do. Her eyes rested on the couch that Blaire owned. It was quite large, and it had to be to fit a frame such as her sister's and still manage to be comfortable. At the sight of the plushy expanse of furniture the vapereon's eyes lit up in approval. Sounds good to me! She thought happily as she trudged lazily over to the couch, promptly collapsing on it once she had made her way over.

Before she knew it, her eyes were closed and she fell fast asleep, two hours passing by in the blink of an eye. After that nap, she woke up with a large yawn and finally sat up, rubbing her eyes groggily.

"Oh wow! I needed that!" She said happily, feeling refreshed from her nap. She looked over at the clock and her eyes widened, "two hours?!?" she gawked, "it only felt like I was asleep for a couple of minutes! I need to-" Suddenly, a loud rumble from her stomach cut her off. "B-But I just ate a huge meal a couple of hours ago..." she told the offending organ, "how could you be hungry already?" Her stomach didn't heed her words, though it was still a bit bloated from breakfast, as it simply rumbled once more.

"Fiiiiine." Fontina sighed in exasperation as she slowly got up and walked into Blaire's kitchen. Looking around, her eyes settled on the primary cause of her actions thus far. The box of Wacan berries.

You know...those weren't actually that bad... Fontina thought to herself. Sure the taste was a bit off, but it wasn't really as horrible as Blaire made it out to be...

Little did Fontina know that this was a property of the Wacan berries. Once you ate one, if you weren't careful you could begin to eat another, and it would simply keep stacking until the user's metabolism slowed to a snail's pace, leading to increased weight gain and lack of movement, as well as sleeping much more frequently. This was a staple of a Snorlax's body and personality, and so this was the preferred snack for them, but for other Moemon species? Not so much. However, since Fontina had already fallen prey to the first berry, and seeing so many within arm's reach, she couldn't help but want another, especially since she felt the call of hunger, which was actually just another property of said berry.

Indeed the Wacan berry was quite a crafty berry indeed, for having no actual sense of intelligence.

It was no surprise at that point that Fontina found herself grabbing an entire box of them and then grabbing a couple bags of family sized potato chips as well as some snack cake boxes that Blaire had, though even with this hefty amount it seemed like Fontina hadn't even made a dent in her sister's supply of food. Heading back over to the couch she sat down and popped open a bag.

Well...Bon appetite I suppose. She thought with a shrug as she popped another Wacan berry into her mouth and began eating as all thoughts of productivity began to flow out of her mind...
13221122.title: Who needs to go to class right?

choices: Fontina returns to the library, where nothing of note happens
Fontina spends the day thinking about what Blaire had said.
132212.content:
(Author's Note: I just want to point out that, in the last chapter, the author said that Fontina took a bite of a Wacan berry, and, in the chapter before that, the author said that the berry in question looked like a blue apple. That's not what a Wacan berry looks like. Wacan berries look like this http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/W... The berry the author was describing was a Yache berry, which does look like a blue apple http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Y... So, instead of incorrectly referring to the berry Fontina ate, I'm going to refer to it as a Yache berry. Problem? Bite me. Also, I feel I should say that a Lax Incense does not make its holder lazy; it makes it easier to dodge attacks in battle. But, I digress.)

As Fontina watched her big sister eat, she figured out exactly how the Flareon got so big; she ate like there was no tomorrow! If Fontina didn't know any better, she'd have thought that the girl sitting beside her was just a Snorlax in disguise. Whatever food was in front of her vanished in less than 10 seconds.

"So," the curvy Vaporeon said, trying to start a new conversation, "what exactly was that berry I ate?" Blaire looked at her sister and chuckled. "Are you STILL worried about that? Let me ask you something; if a berry would cause harm to any student at this school, why would we be allowed to have within 50 ft. of the building, let alone in the kitchen?" Fontina put a hand to her chin. "I... guess that makes sense. Still... would it kill you to at least let me know a little bit about it?"

Blaire playfully patted her little sister on the back and said, "Alright, you win. It's called a Yache berry. If you eat it, it cuts the damage of one super-effective Ice-type move in half. There are 18 berries like that in total; one for each type of move, even Normal-type moves." "Wait," Fontina said, "Normal-type moves aren't super-effective against anything; they can't devastate an opponent." Blaire chuckled again. "Oh, trust me, I saw a Delphox boy take a Giga-Impact in gym class during my freshman year; that is so not true." Fontina cringed at the thought of seeing someone get hit with a Giga-Impact.

"Anyway," Blaire continued after finishing a mouthful of muffin, "apparently, those kinds of berries only taste good if you have a weakness to those types of moves... generally, anyway; there are a few exceptions here and there." She was about to put what she thought was a strawberry into her mouth, but stopped when she noticed that it was actually a Chople berry. "Oh, here's one of those berries. Here', I'll show you what I mean." She then turned her head to the kitchen. "Margaret!" She shouted.

A few seconds later, a rather pudgy-looking Weavile girl walked up to Blaire and Fontina. "Yes, Ms. Blaire?" The Weavile girl asked. "Well, Margaret," Blaire started, "I'm explaining to my little sis how these types of berries work. You know, the ones that weaken super-effective moves?" Margaret nodded. "And I just so happened to find a Chople berry here with my breakfast," Blaire continued. "I was telling her about how these berries generally only taste good to someone if they have a weakness to such types of moves. Would you like to help me demonstrate?"

She handed the Chople berry over to Dark-Ice type girl who happily ate it. "Yummy," Margaret said, rubbing her chubby belly. "That's all I needed, thanks," Blaire said with a smile as Margaret went back to work. "Now then, where were we? Oh, that's right." With that, the two eeveelutions resumed their breakfast.

After about 20 minutes, both girls finished their breakfast and rubbed their overfed bellies. "That was good," Fontina said. "I just hope I don't put on too much weight from all that food..." Blaire laughed and patted her sister on the head. "Now, don't worry your pretty little head about how you look. You're beautiful no matter how big you are. Hell, I think you'd look great being even bigger. Imagine how good you'd look if you were as big as me!"

Fontina's grew wide at that idea. Strangely, she didn't know how to feel about it: on the one hand, she wasn't very happy about being as chubby as she normally was, so the thought of being bigger scared her a bit; on the other hand, Blaire seemed to enjoy her size - which was likely to increase after she finished digesting the mountain of food she had just eaten - and wore it very well, so maybe she'd look pretty good too.
132212.title: Breakfast and berries

133.content:
As the curvy librarian searched for her book, there was another book that had made its way under the shelves, coated in dust and surrounded by an eerie, eye-catching glow.

"Hmm? What's that?" Fontina wondered. She bent over (proudly displaying her incredible rump) and picked up the book. It seemed to glow brighter when she grabbed it. She blew on the front cover, sending a thick cloud of dust into the air. After she was through choking, she got a good look at the front cover of the book.

"'Book of Curses,' huh?" she mused. "Interesting..." She opened the book to the first page. The book glowed even brighter.

"'To whom it may concern: turn back before it's too late! If the next page you turn, you will meet a horrible fate!'" Fontina read. She was definitely intrigued.

Despite the stern warning provided by the book, she turned the page. There was a blinding flash and Fontina fainted.

When she woke up, she...

14.content:
“Hmm… Not a bad start,” Don Tanner chuckled as he placed the three files to the side. “In any case, I should look over what other girls we’ve got in this school… Hopefully they’re as cute as the first few girls…”

Quickly picking up the files with a large smirk on his face, the dragonair Moemon lifted up the files and read them to himself.

Student No. 4

Name: Lynn
Gender: Female
Moemon: Bayleef
Age: 17
Class: Junior
Description: A tall moemon with an increduous bust, her outfits usually consist of name brand halter tops and sarong skirts. She keeps her bangs short, framing her pretty face, and wears the rest of her long, viridian locks in a low bun at the back of her neck. She wears a leaf themed choker around her neck.
Personality: Despite being born into a wealthy family Lynn is incredibly down to earth, if not a little naive and unsuspecting. She's kind hearted hopeless romantic and has been friends with Perry since she was a Chikorita moemon. On a side note, she's the only one of her friends with any cooking talent.
Extra: She's prone to culture shock, usually flipping out over some of the strange foods or customs in a new town. But she's always willing to try something new and usually ends up completely absorbed in it. She’s also the president of the gardening club.

Student No. 5

Name: Perry
Gender: Female
Moemon: Poliwhirl
Age: 16
Class: Sophomore
Description: A moemon of average stature with a relative hourglass figure who wears her blue hair in an almost boyish fashion sweeping across her face. Her bangs sweep left, and always have since she was a Poliwag. She tends to dress in cutoff jeans and sleeveless tops tied at the shoulders
Personality: For what she lacks in intuition and general common sense, she makes up for in optimism and passion. No matter what she does, she always gives 100% and never backs down from a challenge. She's the group's self-appointed leader.
Extra: She wears a King's Rock as a bracelet, fashioning it as a lucky charm, completely unaware that it could divert her from her desired evolution: Poliwrath. She’s also the youngest Swim Team Captain in the History of the Academy

Student No. 6

Name: April
Gender: Female
Moemon: Aipom
Age: 15
Class: Freshman
Description: Even younger than she looks, most people confuse her with a prepucsent tween due to her large brown eyes, baby face, and total lack of curves. She wears a small purple hoodie with a shared white pocket over a tank top and skinny jeans that conceal a rather fit and agile figure
Personality: To completely contrast her outwardly innocent appearance, her true personality is devilish and caniving. Often seen with a sneaky twinkle in her eye and something that isn't hers in her hands, she has gotten her friends in more than their share of trouble. But despite that the bond between them is strong and she is always willing to go without so that one of her friends might feel better.
Extra: Her appetite is huge, especially for sweets. Fortunately for her, an active lifestyle of climbing trees and running from agitated plunderees has granted her a lightning-fast metabolism. But now that she's on the straight and narrow, what will become of her teensy-weensy waistline? She’s been known as a thief around the school grounds.

“I might need to keep an eye on these three…” Don Tanner mused to himself as he looked over the files. “Alright, I think I should probably look over some of the other girls here…”
14.title: More Girls Please!

Extra: Lilian has a personal maid who attends classes with her. Her name is Suzu, who’s a curvy Frosslass Moemon who wears a blue maid outfit that contains her impressive frame (which usually catches quite a few people’s eyes). Personality: A supercharged young woman who seems to have an endless energy supply to her name. She usually loves meeting new people, and can be overly friendly, even to girls (which has sparked a few rumors). She’s a bit of an airhead.
